article_title: Hungarian Banking Law Hits KBC Group
article_text:
Belgian bank KBC Group said Tuesday it will have to set aside at least €162 million ($220.2 million) in the second quarter because of the impact of a new Hungarian law on its Budapest-based unit K&H Bank Zrt.

Under a law approved by parliament July 4, banks are required to compensate retail customers for unilateral increases of interest and...
